Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your daily routine and provide you with significant benefits. Considering its high quality and functionality, I propose a price of $100 for this exceptional item. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing me to fairly compensate for my efforts and resources invested into creating this product. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
